name: Space Devil
summary: Welcome to the exciting world of SpaceDevil, the first Teaser Demo from our indie studio, where you’ll take on the role of an employee of the CaMaC (Canis Manor Consortium) on the ALISS (Artemis Laboratory International Space Station). You’ll need to fight against enemies and survive adverse conditions as you make your way towards the central corridor of the station, which connects the labs with the main reactor control center.
